text: Hagi Jerusalemi kumapintira, kefo avu'ava zamo'a tinkerifinti timo aviteteno herafiramino eviankna huno enevie. Ana kumapina vahe'ma hazenkema nezamiza zamo'ene, maka zama eri havizama nehaza zamofo agasasamo avite'ne. Ana hige'na Nagrama koana kri vahe'ene zamahe kuzafa'ma ante'naza vaheke'za zamage'noe.
